description: Nothing in the interface works. Every item is greyed out

With gPodder you can search for and subscribe to podcasts. gPodder can then download past episodes and inform you of new episodes. There is functionality to track which episodes you've listened to and to transfer episodes to a mp3 player or phone.

gPodder has a simple interface and works well. Unless you're using a media player or mobile app to manage podcasts, give this a try.

I've been listening to podcasts, using Gpodder, since the nineties. It has never given me a problem in all that time, it just always does the job. Since I listen to about 3 hours of podcasts every day, this is important to me as I travel back and forth to work. Without Gpodder, my life would be much more complicated.

If you have been seeking an RSS reader/subscription platform for everything from podcasts, news sites to youtube channels. Look no further. This is a fantastic app. It does all the things and then some without a problem. You can open your youtube subscriptions and map them to totem or mpv in a preset quality. If you want to keep up to date while still not giving away your soul this is great friend to have. I absolutely love this application!
I tried 9 url's and can't find any that work. I might as welll just listen online atleast that works
This has been the best podcast manager that I've found on Linux. Recommended.

I really didn't need more than this. I prefer this even to my phone for one small example: Drama of The Week changes locations after a few weeks. So, this just downloads it and lets me play it when I'm ready. On my phone, if I don't have it running in the background and downloading it all the time, it will say "Error...blah blah blah". But, this is even better. Take the 5 stars.
If it rejects all the ones I currently listen to on my phone, and suggests a whole 8 to choice from...

I love using gPodder to get all my podcasts. I am subscribed to many and gPodder keeps them all updated and downloads episodes. Very easy to use.

Highly recommended!
summary: Easy to use and very capable

description: boooooooooooooo not recomended
summary: clunky interface, no bit rate options

description: Syncs with AntennaPod on Android if you pair devices on the website.

Installed from Debian main. Works perfectly. Has a clear interface, easy to add and manage BBC radio podcast RSS feeds, playback via system default audio player. Does just what I need it to and no more. Thanks!
summary: Excellent app does just what I need it to

description: Installed easy, I setup an account that lets me sync my podcasts across devices.
summary: Works well for me, room for improvement, but I would recommend

If it rejects all the podcasts I currently listen to on my phone, and I can't even find silimlar ones to make up for it....
Why have the enter URL option if it won't work for anything?
Searching for podcasts freezes the app
summary: Searching for podcasts freezes the app

description: I've used this application off and on for years. The gpodder site isn't being maintained anymore, so those features no longer work properly, but the subscription by URL still works. I use it to load podcasts into my extremely old iPod!
summary: Good app, Launch button broke in 20.04 LTS, worked in 18.04 LTS

description:
This is the best podcatching app available for the Linux platform. If you plan on using it for YouTube channels, I recommend using the flatpak, as the latest updates are necessary to maintain functionality. 

I wish it had an integrated audio player just as an option, but the fact that you can pair it with any media player is pretty cool too.
When trying to sync with iPod user receives the following error "ERROR: Please install the gpod module to sync with an iPod device."
apparntly the flatpak is not allowing to set a default audio/video player on RHEL and Fedora 36 so i installed the rpm and everything is working as intended. So I recommend the rpm over the flatpak
I'm using the adaptive version with PP on pmOS. Setup up your own prefered media player in the settings, Default doesn'seem to work.
only ted talks and the moth works on this app.
zuverlässiger begleiter seit vielen jahren. möcht ich nicht mehr missen.
Now it consistenty HANGS when trying to sync with my MP3 Player. Keeps all currently copied files open, never closes them and - worse of all - prevents me from killing it when it hangs.
Puedes descargar podcast tanto audio como vídeo. Hace tres años te permitía descargar los subtítulos de TED-Talk, pero aparte de este pequeño detalle, va muy bien.
summary: Para mi la mejor aplicación para escuchar Podcast

description:
Me ha gustado mucho la poca experiencia que llevo con el programa.
Pero me gustaría poder sincronizar los podcast en mi iPod Classic

Esencial para gestionar y sincronizar pódcasts. Interesante el complemento de youtube-dl para descargar vídeos y audios de youtube. Los rss de invidious (los que yo utilizo) se descargan más lentos pero no supone ningún problema. Los pódcasts normales descargan en pocos segundos.
summary: Imprescindible para los amantes de los pódcasts

description: Simple d'utilisation, et efficace.
Excellent pour gérer soi-même ses listes et épisodes de podcast sur plusieurs appareils avec la synchronisation.
summary: gpodder: the only free podcaster with sync

description: simple d'utilisation
